songs.title: Encore
songs.lyrics:
[Ice Cube (sample from "No Vaseline")]
Damn!
( Forgot to do somethin', let me see...uh)
Oh, yeah—it ain’t over, motherfuckers

[Parliament (sample from "Theme from the Black Hole")]
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
All around the world for the funk
I'll toast to that
